node.display_long_description:
PokerStars, the world’s leading poker brand, has combined live and online poker in a truly immersive VR experience.

-Study your opponents, pick up on their tells, and chat in real time
-Handle your chips and cards, just as you would at a real-world poker table
-Keep the table fun with interactive props and toys, summoned in an instant

This is the most exciting poker game on the planet, and there’s a seat open for you right now.

- Key Features -

-Authentic poker, blackjack & slots action
-A fully immersive, social experience
-Simple, intuitive, easy to play
-Play real opponents
-Realistic physics, from cards and chips to balloons, pistols and more
-Unlock free chips every day
-Certified RNG

- Exotic locales -

-Medieval Castle
-Cyber Apartment
-Evil Volcano Lair
-Macau 2050
-The Galaxy Space Station
-Macau Suite
-The Showdown Saloon
-The Monte-Carlo Yacht
-The Void

nodes.title: The Big Game Update!
nodes.body_text:
Hey PokerStars VR players we have a new update for you with [Patch 59] now live for download!

This update includes a new sports betting feature on The Big Game this weekend and a brand new Big Game player pack available for purchase.

New Features
- Sports Betting Panel
- Added avatar animation & lipsync to tutorial
- New Fetch Room List for improved game list loading in the lobby
- The Big Game Player Pack

Bug Fixes
- Cards sometimes jumping and auto-folding on Seat 2 in Cyber and Medieval fixed
- Some instances of players seeing grey-cards should be fixed (all saved card skin selections had to be reset)
- Some issues with spin wheel in lobby breaking should be fixed
- Cigar hovering above table fix
- Various spamming error fixes

Join us on Discord

node.reviewDescription: If you are competitive do not play this game . Glitches will destroy an entire week of playing if your trying lead in a spin and god tourney . When the game crashes it stops instantly and tilts about 30 degrees it actually painful and unsettling at the least . When you crash they can refund your buy ins but not a weeks worth of playing . DO NOT buy their chips they can drain rather quickly and how ever much they say the RNG is legit . Deal a few poker hands at home you’ll never see trips, flushes , straights in the same hand , you’ll see this very often in this game that’s designed to drain your chip count quickly . Tried game when it first came out amd deleted . Deleted again recently for the same reasons .

developerResponse.body:
Hey Little_Viking, we're sorry to hear that you have experienced glitches in our game.  We know how this can be an inconvenience and we hope you are reporting these crashes on our server at Discord.gg/PokerStarsVR.  Please try uninstalling and reinstalling your game to see if that fixes any of your issuse and also make sure you are connected to your 5ghz internet as it will offer you better results.  As long as reports are submitted as the issue occurs, we usually can locate the problem and issue a refund.  Backdated requests and multiple requests on one report are usually denied due to our rules on refunds.  If you need assistance with filing a refund, follow the #how-to-submit-a-bug-report channel on our server and it will help you get started.  As for the RNG, the PokerStars VR Random Number Generator (RNG) has been certified by iTech Labs, one of the leading accredited testing laboratories for online gaming worldwide. iTech Labs  has found that the card sequences in PokerStars VR are unpredictable, non-repeatable and uniformly distributed. The PokerStars VR RNG Certificate may be found here: 
https://itechlabs.com/certificates/luckyvr/RNG_Certificate_UK_LuckyVRInc_10Dec19.pdf
We hope you will update your review to let us know if any of these suggestions helped you.

website_page_meta.description: Step into the future with this game-changing release from the biggest name in the business. Visually stunning environments; realistic chip and card movements; an endless supply of interactive toys, props and accessories; and the world’s best poker software powering multiplayer Texas Hold’em action.
website_page_meta.title: PokerStars VR · Oculus Quest
